com.mousebird.maply

Class GlobeGestureHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mousebird.maply.GlobeGestureHandler

  • public class GlobeGestureHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements the various gestures we need and handles conflict between them.

    This is used by the GlobeController to deal with gestures on Android. If you want to mess with this, be sure to subclass the MaplyController and create your own subclass of this.

      • withinBounds

        public static boolean withinBounds(GlobeView globeView,
                   Point2d frameSize,
                   Point3d newPos)
        Check that a given position will be within the given bounds. This is used by the various gestures for bounds checking.
        Parameters:
        newPos - Position we're to check.
        Returns:
        true if the new point is within the valid area.
